pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kiwi is a framework and a set of enhanced PyGTK widgets designed tomake building programs with graphical interfaces both easy to writeand easy to maintain.Kiwi consists of a set of classes and wrappers for PyGTK that weredeveloped to provide a sort of framework for applications. Fullyobject-oriented, and roughly Smalltalk's MVC, Kiwi provides a simple,practical way to build forms, windows and widgets that transparentlyaccess and display your object data.Kiwi is inspired by Allen Holub's Visual Proxy.
